info.title: Snappd API
info.description:
Complete API for screenshot sharing with authentication, upload management, and analytics.

## Features
- Screenshot upload with signed URLs
- Image optimization and metadata extraction
- Share links with access controls (public/private/password)
- View tracking and analytics
- User authentication (email/password, OAuth, magic link)
- Usage quota management

## Security
- All endpoints use HTTPS only
- JWT authentication via Bearer tokens or HTTP-only cookies
- CSRF protection with SameSite=Lax cookies
- Rate limiting on all endpoints
- Row-level security (RLS) in database
